name: The Kanaa
description: The Kanaa is an e-commerce platform tailored for the GCC market, offering a curated range of products across categories with an intuitive shopping experience and optimized performance.

name: MECL (ME Stores)
description: MECL (ME Stores) is a large-scale e-commerce platform serving the Saudi market, offering a wide range of consumer products with a focus on performance, scalability, and seamless shopping experience.

name: PisaStone
description: PisaStone offers high-quality engineered and natural stone surfaces for residential and commercial use. Their products blend durability with aesthetic appeal for various interior and exterior applications.

name: CMS PisaStone
description: Inhouse CMS for managing product listings, reviews, orders, and other website content of Pisastone.

name: Wasalt
description: Wasalt is the first-ever AI-powered real estate platform in Saudi Arabia that deals in both residential as well as commercial real estate properties.

name: Wasalt Auction
description: A web platform for browsing and buying commercial or residential assets from Wasalt auctions via live bidding.

name: Wasalt Auction Console
description: A web platform enabling admins to manage auction data and monitor statistics through dashboards with role-based access.

name: UMS BackOffice
description: A web platform enabling super admins and admins to manage auction data and monitor statistics with role-based permissions.

name: Vougish
description: A headless e-commerce web application for lifestyle and accessory products using Next.js and Magento 2.

name: Yexpedite
description: Yexpedite is a dynamic website designed to streamline and enhance logistics and shipping processes for businesses.

name: HRMS
description: An advanced Human Resource Management System built using Next.js, TypeScript, MongoDB, Prisma ORM, and GraphQL.
